import React, {useState, useRef} from 'react' import SlickSlider from 'react-slick' import {IconButton} from '@material-ui/core' import {ArrowLeft, ArrowRight} from '@material-ui/icons' import {useStyles} from './useStyle' import {settings} from './sliderSettings' const MainSlider = () => { // const [] const slider = useRef(); console.log(slider) const next = () => { slider.slickNext(); }; const previous = () => { slider.slickPrev(); }; const classes = useStyles(); return (
) } export default MainSlider;
